title: Dark Vision
description: For fans of Kelley Armstrong, Deborah Harkness, and Charlaine Harris comes a tale of magic, love and destiny—urban fantasy from a uniquely British perspectiveLily McCain is cursed. With just one touch she can see a person’s future, whether it’s a good fortune or a terrible fate. Afraid of the potent visions she foresees, she distances herself from the world, succumbing to a life of solitude. But at the touch of a mysterious stranger—who has powers of his own—Lily sees a new, chilling future for one where she is fated to make a terrible choice.
author: Debbie  Johnson
